titleStmt.title: Satyres: and satyricall epigrams with certaine obseruations at Black-Fryers? By H:F: of Lincolnes-Inne gent
titleStmt.author: Fitzgeffrey, Henry.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edw[ard]: All-de, for Miles Patrich, and are to be sold at his shop neare S. Dnnstons-Church [sic] in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: In three books, each with separate title page; register continuous.
Errata on G7r, final printed leaf.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop neare S. Dnnstons-Church [sic] in Fleet-street
